Title: Inside
Writer: Julien Maury (by), Alexandre Bustillo (by), Alexandre Bustillo (scenario,  adaptation and dialogue)
Actors: Alysson Paradis, Jean-Baptiste Tabourin, Claude Lul√©, Dominique Frot
Plot: Four months after the death of her husband, a woman on the brink of motherhood is tormented in her home by a strange woman who wants her unborn baby.
